com.teamten.render
Interface Material

All Known Implementing Classes:
AmbientOcclusionMaterial, PhongMaterial
public interface Material

Can shade a material given a list of lights and an intersection point.

Method Summary
 Color shade(RayTracer rayTracer, Vector eye, Intersection intersection, Light[] lightList, boolean debug)
          Return the shaded point for this intersection.
 

Method Detail

shade

Color shade(RayTracer rayTracer,
            Vector eye,
            Intersection intersection,
            Light[] lightList,
            boolean debug)
Return the shaded point for this intersection. The intersection must not be empty and must be in camera space.

Parameters:
eye - vector from eye, not normalized.
Returns:
color of shaded point, never null.
